page.title: 15BRILL TEAMS;SCHOOL GAMES.
page.content: {Playground games}:a survey in Brill School showed that the 5-8 year olds chose Cops and Robbers,a chasing game,as their favourite.The 8-11 year olds chose tennis,a bat and ball game with 2 or 4 players. {Team games}:football is played by 22 players in 2 teams.They have to kick the ball into goals at opposite ends of the pitch.The goals are 2 vertical posts with a horizontal post on them. Netball has 14 players in 2 teams.Goals are scored by throwing a ball into a net top of a post at each end of the pitch.Chinese cricket needs at least 6 in a team.The batter hits the ball and runs round a post.BMX bicycles are very popular amongst boys.They cost from 30 to 700 pounds.Girls favourite games are skipping,roller skating and elastic. Brill has several village teams includ- ing football,cricket,hockey and darts.
